name: Alligator
description: This swamp puppy kept following me while I was trying to take long exposures of the night sky.

name: Niagara Falls
description: A scenic view from the top of the observation deck.

name: Night Beach
description: Long exposure of the beach at night, capturing the movement of the waves and the city behind it.

name: The Whole Falls
description: I wanted to capture the surrounding area of the falls, so I took a quick still frame of what the main park looks like (from the Canadian side).

name: Southwest
description: I was delayed in Nashville airport so I decided to practice shutter dragging.

name: Alcatraz
description: Went to SF in Spring of 2024 and took a tour of Alcatraz. This is a photo of the island from the ferry. Also, this is my wallpaper.
